TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualTreeHelper extends System.Object
public ref class VisualTreeHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一些实用工具方法，用于执行涉及可视化树中的节点的常见任务。

span.span: Provides utility methods that perform common tasks involving nodes in a visual tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可视化树中的节点可以是或对象。Nodes in the visual tree can be either or objects. 特定于可视对象的类型的方法类型化为或。Methods that are specific to a type of visual object are typed as either or . 但是中的某些方法类可以接受值，该值表示可视对象的任何一种。However, some methods in the class can accept a value that represents either type of visual object. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以编程方式访问的对象的多个不同的树状结构。supports programmatic access to several different tree structures of objects. 首先，这显示为可视化树和逻辑树。Primarily, this is exposed as a visual tree and a logical tree. 在某些情况下，逻辑树是中的元素的更有用表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序，但从概念上讲是逻辑树实现在级别超出类。In some cases, the logical tree is a more useful representation of the elements in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application, but conceptually the logical tree is implemented at a level beyond the class. 与可视化树中，不同逻辑树可以表示非可视化数据对象，如。Unlike the visual tree, the logical tree can represent nonvisual data objects, such as . 有关逻辑树的详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information on the logical tree, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md). 逻辑树也支持类似的实用程序方法类， 。The logical tree also is supported by a similar utility method class, . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何枚举视觉对象的所有后代，如果你对序列化可视化对象层次结构的所有呈现信息感兴趣，则可能希望使用该技术。The following example shows how to enumerate all the descendants of a visual object, which is a technique you might want to use if you were interested in serializing all the rendering information of a visual object hierarchy. [!code-csharp[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来确定父可视对象的子元素的总数。Call the method to determine the total number of child elements of a parent visual. 值`reference`可以表示或对象，这就是为什么公共基类型使用作为参数类型。The value of `reference` can represent either a or object, which is why the common base type is used here as a parameter type. ## Examples 下面的示例说明如何枚举视觉对象的所有后代。The following example shows how to enumerate all the descendants of a visual object. 这是如果您要对序列的可视化对象层次结构的所有呈现信息感兴趣或正在执行分析或另一种呈现，则可能会使用一种技术。This is a technique you might use if you are interested in serializing all the rendering information of a visual object hierarchy or are performing analysis or alternative rendering. [!code-csharp[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)]

Public Shared Function GetOpacity (reference As Visual) As Double

param.name: reference
param.span: 要返回其不透明度值的 。

span.span: The whose opacity value is returned.

summary.span: 返回 的不透明度。

span.span: Returns the opacity of the .

returns.span: 一个 类型的值，表示 的不透明度值。

span.span: A value of type that represents the opacity value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不透明度的值表示为介于 0 和 1 之间的值。The value of the opacity is expressed as a value between 0 and 1. 值为 0，则指示元素完全透明; 如果值为 1 指示该元素是完全不透明。A value of 0 indicates that the element is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the element is completely opaque. 值 0.5 表示该元素为 50%不透明。A value of 0.5 indicates that the element is 50 percent opaque. 值小于 0 将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。Values less than 0 are treated as 0, and values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

span.span: The X-coordinate guideline collection of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用像素对齐功能是，以便对象边缘呈现在特定于设备的像素为单位，内容布局固定的过程。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 图形系统使用与设备无关的单元来使分辨率和设备独立。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素都会随着系统的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置自动进行缩放。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 这为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序提供了不同 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序自动感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能由于抗锯齿不规则的边缘呈现出。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间时，可能发生的这些项目，通常可看做模糊，或"软"边缘。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解决此问题，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]消除生成的抗锯齿的柔化边缘的可视化树与设备像素为单位通过启用像素对齐功能，"对齐"中的对象边缘提供一种方法。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用像素对齐功能是，以便对象边缘呈现在特定于设备的像素为单位，内容布局固定的过程。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 图形系统使用与设备无关的单元来使分辨率和设备独立。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素都会随着系统的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置自动进行缩放。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 这为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序提供了不同 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序自动感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能由于抗锯齿不规则的边缘呈现出。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间时，可能发生的这些项目，通常可看做模糊，或"软"边缘。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解决此问题，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]消除生成的抗锯齿的柔化边缘的可视化树与设备像素为单位通过启用像素对齐功能，"对齐"中的对象边缘提供一种方法。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

summary.span: 返回命中测试的最顶层 对象。

span.span: Returns the topmost object of a hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载的方法采用和参数在命中测试期间提供附加功能：The overloaded methods that take and as parameters provide additional functionality during hit testing: - 使用此选项可参与命中测试期间控制对可视化树遍历。Allow you to participate in controlling the visual tree traversal during hit testing. - 可以用来检索所有点或几何图形，而不仅仅是最顶层的一个下视觉对象。Allow you to retrieve all of the visuals under the point or geometry, not just the topmost one.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult HitTest (System.Windows.Media.Visual reference, System.Windows.Point point);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult HitTest(class System.Windows.Media.Visual reference, valuetype System.Windows.Point point) cil managed

summary.span: 通过指定 返回命中测试的最顶层 对象。

span.span: Returns the topmost object of a hit test by specifying a .

returns.span: 的命中测试结果，作为 类型返回。

span.span: The hit test result of the , returned as a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的返回值表示命中对象。The property of the return value represents the object that was hit. > [!NOTE] > 它是用 2D 的可视化树，以返回一个命中测试，这是一个三维命中的测试结果对象。It is possible for a hit test that starts in a 2D visual tree to return , which is a 3D hit test result object. 命中测试在二维可视化树中的启动无缝扩展到任何已定义的三维可视树。Hit testing that starts in a 2D visual tree seamlessly extends into any defined 3D visual tree. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法进行命中测试中的对象。The following example shows how to use the method to hit test the objects within a . [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#100)]

.method public static hidebysig void HitTest(class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D reference, class System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback filterCallback, class System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback resultCallback, class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.HitTestParameters3D hitTestParameters) cil managed
Public Shared Sub HitTest (reference As Visual3D, filterCallback As HitTestFilterCallback, resultCallback As HitTestResultCallback, hitTestParameters As HitTestParameters3D)

public: static void HitTest(System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Visual3D ^ reference, System::Windows::Media::HitTestFilterCallback ^ filterCallback, System::Windows::Media::HitTestResultCallback ^ resultCallback, System::Windows::Media::Media3D::HitTestParameters3D ^ hitTestParameters);

param.name: reference
param.span: 要进行命中测试的 。

span.span: The to hit test.

param.name: filterCallback
param.span: 表示命中测试筛选回调值的方法。

span.span: The method that represents the hit test filter callback value.

param.name: resultCallback
param.span: 表示命中测试结果回调值的方法。

span.span: The method that represents the hit test result callback value.

summary.span: 使用调用方定义的 和 方法对指定 启动命中测试。

span.span: Initiates a hit test on the specified , with caller-defined and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `filterCallback`参数可以是`null`，在这种情况下，它将被忽略。The `filterCallback` parameter can be `null`, in which case, it is ignored. 如果`filterCallback`不是`null`之前, 调用`resultCallback`。If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`. `resultCallback` 不能为 `null`。`resultCallback` cannot be `null`. > [!NOTE] > 它是用 2D 的可视化树，以返回一个命中测试，这是一个三维命中的测试结果对象。It is possible for a hit test that starts in a 2D visual tree to return , which is a 3D hit test result object. 命中测试在二维可视化树中的启动无缝扩展到任何已定义的三维可视树。Hit testing that starts in a 2D visual tree seamlessly extends into any defined 3D visual tree.
